column1: Smoque BBQ////Check off another long time renowned Yelp bookmark.  We came by and picked up a carryout slab of St Louis ribs and they did not disappoint.  The ribs were lean and meaty
column3: and just the right touch of spiciness when accompanied with their sauce.   Hard to say if Smoque or any one particular rib joint is the "best"
column4: but Smoque certainly sets the bar for smoked style of ribs in our experience.  We also like LL Woods
column5: and Famous Dave's for their style of rib preparation and flavoring.  We need to hit Lem's soon to compare.
